statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ -4 \\ -12 \\ 18 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 2 \\ 6 \\ -9 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
